actors.name: Elon's Husk

An empty discarded space suit and a Twitter bird logo with crossed-out eyes lie in the dust. Flames from a SpaceHusk rocket illuminate the night sky.

AGI is closer than you think. But also further. It's complicated.

actors.physicalDescription: Early 70s white male with thinning gray hair combed back. Deep-set gray eyes behind wireframe glasses. Clean-shaven and always in a conservative dark suit and striped tie.
